channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: American Giant Redesigns Its Iconic Classic Full Zip Hoodie
item.description: The refreshed Classic Full Zip hoodie uses a softer cotton fleece, but it’s still US-made. It’s the first major overhaul of American Giant’s most well...

item.title: Apple TV adds support for Google Cast even as Netflix ditches the feature
item.description: The tech giant's adoption of Google Cast signals its interest in making Apple TV a more competitive streaming service at a time when the market is see...

item.title: India’s Digantara raises $50M for space-based missile defence tech
item.description: With this funding, Digantara has raised $64.5 million in total.

item.title: The Best Holiday Delivery Meal Kits (2025)
item.description: Christmas can be daunting. Meal kit boxes from Sunbasket and Blue Apron offer the satisfaction of making a home-cooked feast with a lot less stress.

item.title: 16 Best White Elephant Gifts (2025): Coffee Pot Mug, Legos, Sushi Magnets, and More
item.description: Bring the gift everyone will want to win from this year's holiday party, from a cute jacket for a beer can to magnets they'll wish they could eat.

item.title: Instagram brings Reels to the big screen, starting with Amazon Fire TV
item.description: By bringing Reels to TVs, Instagram can better compete with YouTube, which largely dominates the TV space.

item.title: 9 Best Electric Scooters (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These WIRED-tested two-wheelers will help you scoot scoot scoot around town.

item.title: 15 Best Office Chairs of 2025— I’ve Tested Nearly 60 to Pick Them
item.description: Sitting at a desk for hours? Upgrade your WFH setup and work in style with these comfy WIRED-tested seats.

item.title: Databricks raises $4B at $134B valuation as its AI business heats up
item.description: The data intelligence company has just raised more than $4 billion in a Series L funding round at a $134 billion valuation — up 34% from the $100 bill...

item.title: Hacking group says it’s extorting Pornhub after stealing users’ viewing data
item.description: The Scattered Lapsus$ Hunters hacking collective stole Pornhub premium users’ data, including email addresses and viewing history.
